short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rings When Time to Sign Up For Vaccine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension for Getting an Audio Alert When It's Your Turn on www.maimmunizations.org to Sign Up for the COVID Vaccine. Keeps you from needing to constantly stare at the page, waiting for it to show the signup form.

Extension icon from https://www.flaticon.com.
